title: Highly efficient removal of Sr2+ from aqueous solutions using a polyacrylic acid/crown-ether/graphene oxide hydrogel composite
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7825-7835
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08789A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sheng Chen, Lina Wu, Zhicheng Wu, Zhikun Liu, Zhihua Qiu, Lisheng Chi
The PAA/DB18C6/GO composite was successfully synthesized by a radical cross-linking copolymerization method and was evaluated as an adsorbent for the removal of Sr2+ from simulated nuclear liquid wastes.
